Class DronePool

  • java.lang.Object
    • velinov.java.event.AbsEventDispatchable
      • velinov.java.finken.drone.DronePool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDispatchable

    public class DronePool
extends AbsEventDispatchable
    a singleton pool that holds the FinkenDrones.
    Since:
    Oct 27, 2015
    Author:
    Vladimir Velinov

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String REAL_DRONES_RETRIEVED

      a property that is fired when the new VirtualFinkenDrones are retrieved from the V-REP scene.
